fields.name: Panchromatic
fields.description: Black and white single band spectral group

fields.name: Multi-Spectral
fields.description: Multi-spectral group of many visible and infrared bands, but not hyperspectral

fields.name: Visible RGB
fields.description: True Visible spectrum bands only (three band combination of red, green and blue). Not derived RGB as for SPOT where no Blue band is acquired.
